messages.title: Your choice on 6 May – a Labour government or a Conservative government
messages.content: Under our system the Tories provide the only alternative government to Labour. The Lib Dems cannot form a government. That is the context in which you will have to make your choice on 6 May.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Promises vastly improved social housing services in the area.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Closing the gap between rich and poor
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Says more needs to be done to narrow the gap between rich and poor.
Labour provided support during the recession.
Labour set up Safer Neighbourhood Teams to reduce crime.
Labour delivered new or improved health centres.
Labour established 10 SureStart Children's Centres with plans for more.

mentions.candidate: The only parliamentary candidate standing at this election who was born and bred, and went to school, in [the] constituency.
mentions.partyLeader: References implied to the Prime Minister at the time related to Labour's actions.
mentions.tacticalSituation: Indicates strategic voting considerations to avoid a Conservative victory, stating the Lib Dems cannot form a government.

issues.economy: Labour provided support during the recession. Warns of Tory plans to cut funds from public services. Stress on Labour's commitment to protecting public services.
issues.education: Labour established SureStart Children's Centres and more are on the way.
issues.governance: Comments on Labour's manifesto commitment to a recall mechanism for failing MPs, indicating improved governance.
issues.health: Labour delivered new or improved health centres such as Gracefield Gardens.
issues.socialWelfare: Discusses improving social housing and reducing the gap between the rich and the poor.

housing.content: Labour has delivered better and more affordable homes and vastly improved social housing services in this area.

leaflet.personalStatement: Chuka Umunna shares personal background and commitment to preventing a Tory victory.

contactInformation.address: Streatham Labour Party, 3a Mount Ephraim Road, London, SW16 1NQ

quotes.text: Chuka Umunna shares thoughts on the importance of the upcoming election and the need for a Labour government.
